TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of ORG in LOC . He is a former military officer .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant sued his military unit for wage arrears for his military service in DATE when he had taken part in a military operation in NORP .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of FAC upheld the action and awarded the applicant MONEY ( RUR ) . The judgment was not appealed against and became final .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received a writ of execution and submitted it to ORG of ORG . On DATE , after ORG of ORG had refused to execute the judgement , the applicant submitted the writ to ORG of GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was discharged from the army .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Presidium of ORG of ORG , by way of a supervisory review , quashed the judgment of DATE and remitted the case for a fresh examination to ORG of FAC .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of ORG decided not to examine the action as the applicant had defaulted at CARDINAL hearings .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Military Section of ORG of GPE , acting on a supervisory review , found that the applicant had not been duly summonsed to the hearings before ORG of FAC , quashed the judgment of DATE and the decision of DATE and ordered a re - examination of the case by the Presidium of ORG of ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Presidium of ORG of ORG , by way of supervisory - review proceedings , re - examined the case , awarded the applicant ORG and dismissed the remainder of his claims .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant asked ORG of GPE to initiate a supervisory review in respect of the judgment of DATE . On CARDINAL DATE the request was dismissed .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant unsuccessfully requested the President of ORG of GPE to quash the judgment of DATE by way of a supervisory review . On DATE the Vice President of ORG of the Russian Federation refused to institute supervisory - review proceedings in respect of the judgment of DATE .
